                  Name:"{\"text\":\"Bat Person Chestplate\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gold\"}",
                  Lore:[
                    "\" \"",
                    "[\"\",{\"text\":\"The stats of this armor piece\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"double during the night and\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"triple while in Swamp biomes.\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"Grants a +5% chance to get candy\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"from mobs.\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
                    "\" \"",
                    "{\"text\":\"Full Set Bonus: Bat Powers Activate!\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gold\"}",
                    "[\"\",{\"text\":\"Upgrades the Grappling Hook to\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"give \",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"2\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\" seconds of \",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Slow Falling\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"#F7F8E0\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"after use, turning you into a\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"true vigilante!\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
                    "[\"\",{\"text\":\"Grants a \",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"+5%\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\" chance to find rare\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
					"[\"\",{\"text\":\"candy.\",\"italic\":false,\"color\":\"gray\"}]",
                    "\" \"",
                    "{\"text\":\"You are the hero this world\",\"italic\":true,\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}",
					"{\"text\":\"needs.\",\"italic\":true,\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}",
                    "\" \"",
                    "{\"text\":\"LEGENDARY\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"gold\"}",
                    "\" \""
                  ],
